New Records: Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan put on 105, their highest partnership in T20Is
Key Match Events: Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan's 105-run partnership
Mohammad Haris scored 30 off 14 balls to help Pakistan win by 7 wickets
Daryl Mitchell scored 53 not out for New Zealand
Pre-Game Insights: Kane Williamson was generous in defeat, saying 'Pakistan bowled really nicely, we managed to wrestle back a little bit of momentum'
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam paid tribute to the crowd, saying 'We are feeling like weâ€™re playing at home!'
Kane Williamson said 'We were outplayed, Pakistan bowled really nicely'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan reached the T20 World Cup final for the first time since 2009
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 2-24 for Pakistan
New Zealand's Daryl Mitchell had a record-breaking semi-final score of 53 not out
